clauses.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service
clauses.description: Some services store data on you even if you did not provide that data yourself. For example, users might provide access to their address book, after which a service might also store the phone numbers of that person's contacts.

clauses.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason
clauses.description: This service can edit any content on the service for whatever the reason and at their sole discretion.

clauses.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

clauses.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.

clauses.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
clauses.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.

clauses.title: You must provide your identifiable information
clauses.description: The Service requires users to provide their identifiable information, including phone number, iD number or other information, even though this data collection isn’t essential for the purposes of the service. They may still allow pseudonyms in the foreground.

clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

clauses.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

clauses.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

clauses.title: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
clauses.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.

clauses.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

clauses.title: You may be tracked via social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

clauses.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection
clauses.description: This case means that user data is not anywhere in the world, but somewhere where it is more likely to be obtained and used by government and/or possible data analysts.

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (China)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.

clauses.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

clauses.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
clauses.description: The data retention period states how long a service keeps user data. In this case, the service may anonymize the personal data after its retention period is over and use it for analytical or research purposes.

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

clauses.title: Your biometric data may be collected
clauses.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.

clauses.title: Your provided identifiable information is actively checked by the service
clauses.description: The service checks if the required identifiable information you've provided is correct, and may do so on a regular basis. The check measures could be analyzing your browser information and/or providing the identifiable information to a third-party or the authority, thus compromising your anonymity.

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

clauses.title: Your use is throttled
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

clauses.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.

clauses.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.

clauses.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

clauses.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
clauses.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

clauses.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
clauses.description: Users are responsible for any harm to their computer system or loss of data they may incur through the download of materials from the service.

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

clauses.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

clauses.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed
clauses.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.

clauses.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

clauses.title: This service is only available for commercial use
clauses.description: Users can’t use the Service for individual or personal purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for business to business (B2B).

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

clauses.title: No guarantee is given regarding quality
clauses.description: The Service doesn't warrant or guarantee the quality of the products or services provided.

clauses.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

clauses.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.

clauses.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
clauses.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.

clauses.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

clauses.title: First-party cookies are used
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

clauses.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties
clauses.description: In this context third-parties refers to anyone including friends, family, or company

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.

clauses.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
clauses.description: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the services. The legal guardians are responsible for the use of the service by the minor.

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

clauses.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
clauses.description: You are responsible for the interactions and the disputes that may occur with other users of the Service. In the event of a dispute, you release the Service from all claims resulting from it.
